title: Del Toro subverts gothic romance gender expectations in "Crimson Peak"
text:
Published By: Reuters - Entertainment - Today 
LONDON (Reuters) - Mexican film director Guillermo del Toro says he is putting a fresh spin on the gothic romance genre in "Crimson Peak" by...
